flawed_nl_solution:
Two weeks already passed and Bob has 200 dollars.
Bob needs 1000-200=<<1000-200=8000>>8000 more dollars.
Bob needs to win the competition for at least 8000/100=<<8000/100=80>>80 more weeks.
#### 80

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 8000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
